Module es.grupo9
Package es.grupo9

Class GitManager

java.lang.Object
es.grupo9.GitManager
public class GitManager extends Object
GitManager class. Uses the Github API to search for information.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    GitManager.CommitHttpRequest
    Class to allow the HttpRequest data from the commits to be processed and analysed.
    class 
    GitManager.CommitsDataGit
    Breakdown of Information received from the GitHub API related to commits.
    static class 
    GitManager.CommitUnpack
    Nested class used in the function to get the commits from the branches, accepts a Map and breaks it down into the several components.

    • GitManager

      public GitManager(String auth, String userName, String repoName) throws IOException
      Constructor function, creates an instance of GitManager.
      Parameters:
      auth - User's Github TOKEN.
      userName - User's Github LOGIN username.
      repoName - Github repository name.
      Throws:
      IOException - throws exception when GitHub is null or GHUser is null.

    • userRepositories

      public Map<String,List<String>> userRepositories() throws IOException
      Gathers all the repositories that the user has or participated in, although only shows the public ones it does also count the privates.
      Returns:
      returns a String with the user's repositories.
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown when the GHuser is null

    • numberOfRepositoriesOwned

      @NotNull public @NotNull List<String> numberOfRepositoriesOwned() throws IOException
      Gets the Total number of Public and Private (user's token only) repositories of each collaborator.
      Returns:
      String containing the information mentioned above
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown due to GHUser

    • readFileContent

      @NotNull public @NotNull String readFileContent(String fileName, String ref) throws IOException
      Retrieves and reads the content of the file in question
      Parameters:
      fileName - Name of the file
      ref - Commit reference of the file.
      Returns:
      String Contents of the file, be it in python, java, or any other language.

    • getCommits

      public GitManager.CommitUnpack getCommits(String user, String branchName) throws IOException
      Function to get Commits from the Branches, since the API does not allow for that.
      Parameters:
      user - User's login to look for their commits in the project.
      branchName - Branch in which to look for, for the commits.
      Returns:
      returns a Map into a nested class for it to be able to be processed and used.
      Throws:
      IOException - throws Exception due to .execute and .string.

    • getTag

      public List<Object[]> getTag() throws IOException
      Function to return the Tags that were made in a Repository.
      Returns:
      Returns a Map with the Name of the Tag, and it's Date of publish
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown due to GitHub
